message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer Alice, but that's a bit too high for me. Would you consider $60?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $60. How about we meet in the middle at $110?
It seems like we're still quite far apart on price. I'm willing to go up to $70, but I can't go any higher.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not getting the value I'm looking for. How about we try $115?
